Business news

Industry
Siemens wants to recover a billion more roubles from the castle manufacturer.
"Simens Mobility" is going to get 1.15 billion roubles from the Ural Locomotives. Information is contained in the arbitration files.
11:59, 20 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Field construction
The case against the troubled F.C. Lomonos was brought to trial.
The Moscow District Court registered a criminal case against the CEO"Starting."Dmitri Ipatov and the leader of Alians-Stroy-Nev, Dmitri Ponomaryove.
11:56, 20 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Car sales
The Petersburg authors started a year with a 50% increase in sales
Selling on the peterburg car market at the beginning of this year increased by one and a half times.
11:22, 20 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Penalties against Russia
Reuters: trade between Russia and Turkey has become more complex following new sanctions USA
The American Ordinance on Secondary Sanctions against Banks, which help to circumvent sanctions against Russia, has worsened the situation in Turkish-Russian trade. Reuters reported this.
10:20, 20 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Sponge.
Minfin supported the reduction of duty-free online purchases
The Ministry of Finance refused to approve the maintenance of duty-free imports of personal goods at the current level of Euro1,000. This was reported by the Office, referring to Minfin ' s requests to large Russian markers.
09:06, 20 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Industry
Threats from the future: Business is thinking about risks after the return of foreigners
The year 2023 was very successful for the peterburg industry. The Petersburg industry is well above the Russian average. As a result of 2023, the Petersburg Industrial Production Index was 109.9 per cent, and the manufacturing industry was 111.4 per cent. The download of 4.4 trillion roubles over the past year, the year-on-year fixed capital investment is expected to be 100 billion roubles, was reported by the Vice-Chair of the St. Petersburg Committee on Industrial Policy, Innovation and Trade, Dmitri Progerin.
8:31, 20 February 2024♪
Evgeny Ivanov
Rubl
Russia ' s digital asset market projected growth to 500 billion roubles
The digital financial assets market (CFA) has a capacity of 500 billion roubles in the next three years. The forecast is moderate-optimistic and is included in the AKRA rating agency ' s analysis.
06:58, 20 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Food
Peterburg circuits raised prices because of the price of cocoa beans
Cocoa beans have been on a regular basis in recent years. In January 2024, their value on exchanges reached a historical maximum. Compared to the same period last year, futures cost 60 to 70 per cent, and cocoa continues to grow at a price. In West Africa, 70 per cent of the world ' s cocoa-bob production was responsible for this price escalation.
06:03, 20 February 2024♪
Olga Gugo
Finance
Russian company dividends in 2024 will exceed 5 trillion rubles
SberCIB Investment Research analysts predict that Russian companies will send a record of 4.9 trillion roubles in 2024. They specify that the amount shall take into account only the 59 issuers under the SberCIB analytical coverage. In 2023, they accounted for 93 per cent of total payments of 3.2 trillion. And with other companies, dividends must exceed 5 trillion.
06:03, 20 February 2024♪
Alexander Pyrochav
Patent disputes
Intellectual property sanitaries: Patent trolls bushed
Initiators of multiple trials, which are intended to be intellectual property, have become patent trolls. Typically, their sacrifices become trademarks. Another marker of the patent troll is the registration of a large number of brands in many classes of the International Classification of Goods and Services. The possession of such assets allows trolls to claim real business - for example, to recover compensation for breach of trademark rights.
06:02, 20 February 2024♪
Dimitri Marakulin
Sport
Russian clubs spend hundreds of thousands of euros on training in Turkey and the Emirates
Nearly all the Russian Prime Minister's football clubs (except Orenburg) were in their homeland. It's very proud of the "other producer," ready to provide quality services to our stars. But it was just a one-time break.
06:02, 20 February 2024♪
Igor Gurfinkel
Arrests
The former co-owner of the Taste Azbuki and the Haus Kofe Yakubowski was sent to SIZO.
The Moscow District Court of Meshan changed the measure to prevent the former co-owner of the Azbuka Taste and Coffee Haus Kirill Yakubovsky, who was accused of being particularly serious fraud (art. 159, para. 4 of the Criminal Code).
19:18, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Society
Work without borders: Inclusion in business was discussed in Petersburg
The Forum was held for the third time and annually has brought together representatives of large, medium and small businesses interested in the employment of persons with disabilities, social and educational organizations working with young people with low start-up opportunities, as well as representatives of the community of persons with disabilities. This year ' s theme is " Professional development. What are the indicators for determining the success of the staff member?" The site is traditionally organized by the social agency of the accompanying job, Robot-i.
19:11, 19 February 2024♪
Anastasia Bashmakova
Energy
Pskovenergosbeth will be part of the RAO Inter.
Pskovenergosbeth's security provider of electricity.PAO Inter RAO♪
19:08, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Foreign business
Putin allowed the Expobank to purchase a Russian unit of British HSBC.
The President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, has signed an order under which Russian The export can purchase 100 per cent of the shares of the HSBC bank, which belongs to a single international financial group (Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation).
18:51, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Nationalization
The Roshen factory belonging to Porosenko was transferred to Russia ' s property in Lipetsk.
The Oktyabrsk District Court of Lipezka met the requirements of the Deputy Attorney General of the Russian Federation and turned to the income of the Russian Federation the shares of the Russian Federation ' s " Roscen " Lulipetic Condite Factory, which belonged to the former President of Ukraine, Petra Porosenko, and his son, Alexei Porosenko.
18:22, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Road
Kaliningrad Auttor showed one of Amberavto's electric cars - A5
Kaliningrad Motor Plant"Auttor."Explained the appearance of one of his future electric vehicles.
18:12, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Sheep.
"Wkusville" opened the cafe "Shoriac" in the peterburg TC on the Water Canal.
The Vkusville Products Network opened two new shops at Moscow and Petersburg shopping centers to sell their own food.
16:10, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Personal bankruptcy
Peterburgers have become more likely to apply for personal bankruptcy.
In the past year, the number of individuals claiming personal bankruptcy has increased significantly in Petersburg.
15:23, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Torgue
The building of the barracks in the Arrow will be rebuilt by the "Ruble for Meter" program.
The historic building that belongs to the ensemble of the Cazarma of the Lib Guard of the Strelkov artillery division in the Armory will be reassigned under the "Ruble for Met."
13:49, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru

info.title: Siemens wants to recover a billion more roubles from the castle manufacturer.
info.short_text: "Simens Mobility" is going to get 1.15 billion roubles from the Ural Locomotives. Information is contained in the arbitration files.

info.title: The case against the troubled F.C. Lomonos was brought to trial.
info.short_text: The Moscow District Court registered a criminal case against the director of the Petrostroya Generator, Dmitri Ipatov, and the leader of the Alians-Stroy-Nev, Dmitri Ponomarev.

info.title: Reuters: trade between Russia and Turkey has become more complex following new United States sanctions
